original_title: By Satan Possessed: The Search for the Devil
overview: America Undercover looks at the phenomenon of Satanism in the World. It talks to practitioners of Satan worship and interviews those who claim that they have been victimized by it. It also talks to some of the people who want to stamp Satanism out for good. Same doc as 'In Satanâ€™s Name', but with American narration.
title: By Satan Possessed: The Search for the Devil
